translated: They apply their minds to understanding.

original: des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa yang mi mnga'/
analyzed: des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa yang mi mnga'/
translated: The TathƒÅgata does not feel pleased by that,

original: thugs ya yo por yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po yin no //
analyzed: thugs ya yo por yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po yin no //
translated: nor does his mind become crooked. This is the first establishment of mindfulness.

original: gzhan yang ston pa zhes bya ba nas phan pa dang bde bar mdzad pa'o zhes 'khor gyi nang du chos ston par mdzad cing zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang ston pa zhes bya ba nas phan pa dang bde bar mdzad pa'o zhes 'khor gyi nang du chos ston par mdzad cing zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
translated: Moreover, when the Teacher teaches the Dharma in the midst of the assembly, saying ‚ÄúI am the one who benefits and brings happiness,‚Äù as before,

original: de la nyan thos rnams de la gus par byas te nyan par mi byed /
analyzed: de la nyan thos rnams de la gus par byas te nyan par mi byed /
translated: if the disciples do not listen respectfully to that,

original: rna gtod par mi byed /
analyzed: rna gtod par mi byed /
translated: do not lend an ear,

original: kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog par mi byed na /
analyzed: kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog par mi byed na /
translated: and do not set their minds on understanding,

original: des de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzod par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: des de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzod par mi 'gyur /
translated: the TathƒÅgata does not become intolerant

original: thugs ma rangs par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: thugs ma rangs par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o //
translated: or displeased. This is the second establishment of mindfulness.

original: gzhan yang ston pa zhes bya ba nas phan pa dang bde bar byed pa'o zhes 'khor gyi nang du chos ston par mdzad cing zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang ston pa zhes bya ba nas phan pa dang bde bar byed pa'o zhes 'khor gyi nang du chos ston par mdzad cing zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Moreover, when the Teacher teaches the Dharma in the midst of the assembly, saying ‚ÄúI am the one who benefits and brings happiness,‚Äù as before,

original: de la nyan thos kha cig ni de la gus par byas te nyan par byed /
analyzed: de la nyan thos kha cig ni de la gus par byas te nyan par byed /
translated: Some of the listeners will listen respectfully,

original: rna gtod par byed /
analyzed: rna gtod par byed /
translated: they will lend an ear,

original: kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog par byed /
analyzed: kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog par byed /
translated: and they will set their minds on understanding.

original: kha cig ni gus par byas nas nyan par mi byed /
analyzed: kha cig ni gus par byas nas nyan par mi byed /
translated: But some will not listen respectfully,

original: rna gtod par mi byed /
analyzed: rna gtod par mi byed /
translated: they will not lend an ear,

original: kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog par mi byed na /üîΩde la gang dag de la gus par byas te /
analyzed: kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog par mi byed na / de la gang dag de la gus par byas te /
translated: and they will not set their minds on understanding.

original: nyan par byed /
analyzed: nyan par byed /
translated: Those who listen respectfully,

original: rna gtod par byed /üîΩkun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog par byed pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rna gtod par byed / kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog par byed pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par yang mi 'gyur /
translated: lend an ear,üîΩand set their minds on understanding will not please the TathƒÅgata,

original: thugs ya yo por yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thugs ya yo por yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the TathƒÅgata will not be pleased with them.

original: gang dag de la gus par byas @173b te nyan par yang mi byed /
analyzed: gang dag de la gus par byas @173b te nyan par yang mi byed /
translated: Those who do not listen respectfully,

original: rna gtod par yang mi byed /
analyzed: rna gtod par yang mi byed /
translated: do not lend an ear,üîΩand do not set their minds on understanding will not displease the TathƒÅgata,

original: kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog par yang mi byed na des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzod par yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: kun shes pa'i sems nye bar 'jog par yang mi byed na des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bzod par yang mi 'gyur /
translated: and the TathƒÅgata will not be displeased with them.

original: thugs ma rangs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa yin no //
analyzed: thugs ma rangs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa yin no //
translated: This is the third close placement of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gyis ni mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring po nas 'di snyam du /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gyis ni mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa yun ring po nas 'di snyam du /
translated: In brief, the TathƒÅgata has long had this thought:üîΩ‚ÄúHow good it would be if my disciples would practice the well-taught Dharma and cultivate it in the right way!‚Äù

original: gdul ba rnams bdag gis legs par bshad pa'i chos la sgrub pa ji lta ba bzhin du nan tan du byed kyang ji ma rung snyam du dgongs pa yun ring po nas de ltar dgongs pa chos kyi rje 'khor yongs su sdud pa de'i bzhed pa de phun
analyzed: gdul ba rnams bdag gis legs par bshad pa'i chos la sgrub pa ji lta ba bzhin du nan tan du byed kyang ji ma rung snyam du dgongs pa yun ring po nas de ltar dgongs pa chos kyi rje 'khor yongs su sdud pa de'i bzhed pa de phun
translated: For a long time, he has had this thought, and the Lord of the Dharma, who gathers a retinue, has that wish fulfilled.

original: sum tshogs pa dang rgud pa dag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa med par rab tu 'byed do //
analyzed: sum tshogs pa dang rgud pa dag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa med par rab tu 'byed do //
translated: He distinguishes this without affliction by prosperity and decline.

original: de dag kyang 'khor gsum gyi bye brag gis gsum du rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang 'khor gsum gyi bye brag gis gsum du rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: And those are established as three by the distinction of the three spheres.

original: 'khor gsum po gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'khor gsum po gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three spheres?

original: thams cad gcig tu yang dag bsgrub pa 'di ni 'khor gcig pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad gcig tu yang dag bsgrub pa 'di ni 'khor gcig pa yin no //
translated: The accomplishment of all as one is the single sphere.

original: thams cad gcig tu log par bsgrub pa 'di ni 'khor gnyis pa yin no //üîΩgsum pa ni de dag kha cig ni yang dag par bsgrub la /
analyzed: thams cad gcig tu log par bsgrub pa 'di ni 'khor gnyis pa yin no // gsum pa ni de dag kha cig ni yang dag par bsgrub la /
translated: This is the second retinue.üîΩThe third is those who are both correct and incorrect.

original: de dag kha cig ni log par bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag kha cig ni log par bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: The fourth is those who are neither correct nor incorrect.

original: bag chags yang dag par bcom pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: bag chags yang dag par bcom pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the complete destruction of the residues?

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa la reg pa'am gzigs pa'am bzhugs pa la nyon mongs pa yod pa lta bu'i g-yo ba kun tu spyod pa rab tu rgyu ba gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pas bag chags dang bcas te yang dag par bcom mo //
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa la reg pa'am gzigs pa'am bzhugs pa la nyon mongs pa yod pa lta bu'i g-yo ba kun tu spyod pa rab tu rgyu ba gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pas bag chags dang bcas te yang dag par bcom mo //
translated: The TathƒÅgata has completely destroyed, together with their residues, the movements, the activities, and the manifestations which are like the defilements in one who touches, sees, or lives with the TathƒÅgata.

original: dgra bcom pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang g-yo ba dang bltas pa dang smras pa dang / gnas pa dag la nyon mongs pa yod pa dang 'dra ba'i g-yo ba yod pa kho na'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang g-yo ba dang bltas pa dang smras pa dang / gnas pa dag la nyon mongs pa yod pa dang 'dra ba'i g-yo ba yod pa kho na'o //
translated: In the case of the Arhats, the movements which are like the defilements are not completely destroyed, even though the defilements have been abandoned, for they still have movements in regard to their postures, their looks, their words, and their way of living.

original: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the absence of confusion?

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba yin pa dang / gang du yin pa dang / ji ltar yin pa dang / gang gi tshe yin pa de der de'i tshe de bzhin du legs par bsgrub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zhig bsgrub par bya ba yin pa dang / gang du yin pa dang / ji ltar yin pa dang / gang gi tshe yin pa de der de'i tshe de bzhin du legs par bsgrub pa'i phyir te /
translated: The Tathagata is the one who accomplishes, the place is the place of accomplishment, the manner is the manner of accomplishment, and the time is the time of accomplishment.

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid yin no //
translated: This is the nature of the Tathagata's nonforgetfulness.

original: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thams cad dang / yul thams cad dang / mdzad pa thams cad kyi thabs rnams la bsnyel ba mi mnga' zhing rtag tu dgongs pa nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa 'di ni der bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid du blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thams cad dang / yul thams cad dang / mdzad pa thams cad kyi thabs rnams la bsnyel ba mi mnga' zhing rtag tu dgongs pa nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa 'di ni der bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid du blta bar bya'o //
translated: Here, the nature of the Tathagata's nonforgetfulness should be understood as the nonforgetfulness and constant attention to all the activities of the Tathagata, to all the objects, and to all the means of activity.

original: thugs rje chen po gang zhe na /
analyzed: thugs rje chen po gang zhe na /
translated: What is great compassion?

original: khams gsum na spyod pa'i sems can thams cad la rtag tu sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa thams cad la dmigs @174a * //
analyzed: khams gsum na spyod pa'i sems can thams cad la rtag tu sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa thams cad la dmigs @174a * //
translated: It is the constant attention to all the aspects of suffering of all beings who live in the three realms.

original: pa'i thugs rjes gnas pa 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab gang yin pa dang / de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams so //üîΩrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: pa'i thugs rjes gnas pa 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab gang yin pa dang / de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos rnams so // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na /

original: sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug shes rab dang snying rje'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pas sa gong nas gong du 'dzeg pa'i rim gyis bskal pa chen po grangs med pa gsum gyis ser sna la sogs pa sgrib pa thams cad
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug shes rab dang snying rje'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pas sa gong nas gong du 'dzeg pa'i rim gyis bskal pa chen po grangs med pa gsum gyis ser sna la sogs pa sgrib pa thams cad
translated: By means of the six perfections such as generosity, which are embraced by the skillful means of wisdom and compassion, one ascends from one level to the next.üîΩIn this way, over the course of three measureless kalpas, all the obscurations such as stinginess are eliminated together with their habitual tendencies.

original: bag chags dang bcas te spangs pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdogs  pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs la /
analyzed: bag chags dang bcas te spangs pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdogs  pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs la /
translated: This is the perfection of generosity and the other perfections, which is complete in every way and is the fully manifest enlightenment of a perfect buddha.

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bur lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bur lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: It is like a wish-fulfilling gem, for it ensures that the activities of the buddhas are uninterrupted and spontaneous.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa brnyes pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhib tu ni 'phags pa gtsug na rin po che'i mdo la sogs pa las blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa brnyes pa rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhib tu ni 'phags pa gtsug na rin po che'i mdo la sogs pa las blta bar bya'o //
translated: The thorough completion of the perfections of the Tathagatas who have attained the unexcelled should be carefully examined in the noble Ratnacudapariprcchd and other sutras.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba nyid ni rgyu'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa bcu ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog thob par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad las nges par 'byung ba nyid ni rgyu'o zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa bcu ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog thob par byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin te /
translated: The cause is the definite emergence from all the bodhisattva stages. The bodhisattva stages, the Joyous and so on, are the cause for attaining the state of the foremost of all beings.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa nyid ni 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa nyid ni 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: the state of being the foremost of all beings is the result.

original: rnam pa thams cad du mi snang ba nyid ni chos kyi sku ste zhes bya ba ni ji skad du chos kyi sku ni so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du mi snang ba nyid ni chos kyi sku ste zhes bya ba ni ji skad du chos kyi sku ni so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The Dharma Body is the non-appearance in any way. The Dharma Body has the characteristic of being inconceivable because it is to be personally experienced by each one for himself.

original: rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is not the domain of intellectual knowledge,

original: 'jig rten na dpe med pa nyid do zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten na dpe med pa nyid do zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
translated: it is said to be without example in the world.

original: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i rgyan gyi rgya cher bshad pa /
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i rgyan gyi rgya cher bshad pa /
translated: This completes the commentary on the Ornament of the Mahayana Sutras.

original: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: It was composed by Master Non-Substantiality.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'akya sim ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
